vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a R-10(A) Single Family District on property zoned an A(A) Agricultural District, on the west line of Cedar Ridge Drive, north of West Red Bird Lane
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval 
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval
Z-25-000042 / Z245-195(RC)
Note: This item was deferred by the City Council at the public hearing on August 13, 2025, and is scheduled for consideration on August 27, 2025.
